text: kmean kar sangsay laey pitabrakd nasa avei del puok anak ampeavneav khnhom towkean vea noh ku vea min ach chhlaeyotb champoh kar ampeav neav ban laey teang nowknong lokey nih ning thngai barlok . haey pitabrakd nasa kanleng vilotralb robsa puok yeung ku tow champoh a l laoh temuoyokt . haey pitabrakd nasa puok del bampean kuchea puok nork
